Want to upload files in formats other than PDF & DOC? Well now you can!
Admins can now configure the following formats for file uploads:
- PDF
- DOC
- DOCX
- XLS
- XLSX
- CSV
What Else:
Minor Bug Fixes

What’s New?
1. Manager Experience
Introducing the all new home page experience made especially for Managers! The new experience enables Managers to better engage and assist their team members - directly reporting to them or anywhere in their organizational hierarchy. Now, Managers can help their team members DO MORE with Vymo.
Key Benefits:
- Dashboard to track key metrics of your team at one place.
- High-Level view of your team’s performance on conversions and activities completed.
- and much more...
This feature is a staggered launch and will be available for select customers initially with a broader rollout to all managers by January. Consider this an early Christmas present.
2. Activity Drafts
Wasn’t it painful to discard an Activity form when you realize you didn’t have all the information required to fill the form? Worry no more! With this update, you can use save drafts on Activity records too.
Benefits:
- Save your work while filling out the long forms without having to submit or discard the form.
- Easily pick up/resume work on draft records for leads, partner, activities, customers, contacts ... make that everything
What Else?
Fixed few minor bugs to make your app experience even better.

What’s New?
Google Calendar Support
You can now connect your Google calendar with Vymo calendar and see all your Google calendar items inside Vymo.
Benefits:
- No more switching calendars - just one calendar does it all.
What Else?
A few bug fixes and improvements for a better in-app experience.

Goal Management
Introducing the new goal management feature. You can view all your organizational goals, progress made on the goal, time left to complete, and expected rate of completion all real-time, inside Vymo.

Key Benefits:
All your goals in Vymo
View real-time goal progress
Easy color-coded competition risk highlighter for goals
Understand the expected rate vs. actual goal completion rate for every user
Aggregated team view of goals for managers
User wise goal monitoring for managers

What's new?

- Call-to-Actions (CTA) Within Notifications:
Every notification you get from the Vymo app is now supercharged with specific call-to-actions. On choosing an action from a notification, Vymo directly opens to the update page where you can enter specific details and submit it.

Benefits:
- You can now perform actions from Vymo notifications itself.
- Notification CTAs are prioritized, helping you #DoMore with Vymo.

What Else?
- Bug fixes and app-wide performance improvements.

What's new?
- Improvement in Password Security Policies:
Now, as a Vymo customer, you can customise the password & user account security policies. You can define the password age, auto-logout intervals, password expiry rules etc. as per your business needs.

Benefits:
- Customise your password policies as per your organisation's security policies.
- Enhanced level of customisation to support complex password rules and organisation's security needs.

What Else?
- Bug fixes and app-wide performance improvements.
